body: Maybe one of the best I had read in my life

What would probably happen is that he got turned back, his sisters want an explanation, he showed the email, they figured what happened, they forced him to become shota again, harem time every day, repeat cycle till he die. 
orhemadethemturnintolittlesisterswiththeprogramsoimoutoloverscanrejoicebutthatain'thappening
Wait, they are already imoutos, technically. He just got shrunk. Mannnnn this is confusing.
Either way, this is a true gem. Can't wait for next release!
next chapter translate to english please
I can't wait to see the 3rd chapter translated, shit was good. I'm guessing after a week he turns back to normal, but by then his sisters love him.
